Module fi.tuni.progthree.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Class WeatherApp

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.WeatherApp
public class WeatherApp extends javafx.application.Application
JavaFX application class for the WeatherApp. Extends the Application class from JavaFX, providing the entry point for the JavaFX application.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage) throws Exception
      The overridden start method from the Application class. Initializes and configures the JavaFX stage, sets up the UI components, and displays the WeatherApp GUI.
      Specified by:
      start in class javafx.application.Application
      Parameters:
      stage - The primary stage for the JavaFX application.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an exception occurs during the initialization.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method that launches the WeatherApp application.
      Parameters:
      args - Command-line arguments (not used in this application).

    • updateCityName

      public void updateCityName(String newCityName)
      Updates the city name used in the WeatherApp. This method is called when the user performs a search for a new city.
      Parameters:
      newCityName - The new city name to be set in the WeatherApp.

    • fetchCurrentTemperature

      public int fetchCurrentTemperature(String cityName)
      Fetches the current temperature for a given city using the OpenWeatherMap API.
      Parameters:
      cityName - The name of the city for which the temperature is to be fetched.
      Returns:
      The current temperature in Celsius for the specified city.

    • addToFavorites

      public void addToFavorites(String cityName)
      Adds the specified city to the list of favorites. Fetches weather data for the city, extracts relevant information, and creates a FavoriteEntry. The entry is then added to the list of favorites, and the updated list is written to the file.
      Parameters:
      cityName - The name of the city to be added to favorites.

    • printDailyForecast

      public void printDailyForecast(String completeURL)
      Prints the daily forecast for the specified URL. This method uses a DailyForecastHandler to fetch and display daily weather information in a ListView within the daily tab.
      Parameters:
      completeURL - The complete URL for fetching daily forecast data.

    • updateWeatherInformation

      public void updateWeatherInformation(String cityName, javafx.scene.control.Label cityNameLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label countryNameLabel, javafx.scene.image.ImageView iconImageView, javafx.scene.control.Label temperatureLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label currentWeatherLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label feelsLikeLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label humidityLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label airQualityLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label airSpeedLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label visibilityLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label dateTimeLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label sunriseLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label sunsetLabel)
      Updates the weather information for the specified city and sets the corresponding UI elements. This method fetches weather data using the OpenWeatherMap API, extracts relevant information, and updates labels, images, and other UI elements accordingly.
      Parameters:
      cityName - The name of the city for which weather information is to be updated.
      cityNameLabel - The label for displaying the city name.
      countryNameLabel - The label for displaying the country name.
      iconImageView - The ImageView for displaying the weather icon.
      temperatureLabel - The label for displaying the temperature.
      currentWeatherLabel - The label for displaying the current weather description.
      feelsLikeLabel - The label for displaying the "Feels Like" temperature.
      humidityLabel - The label for displaying humidity information.
      airQualityLabel - The label for displaying air quality information.
      airSpeedLabel - The label for displaying wind speed information.
      visibilityLabel - The label for displaying visibility information.
      dateTimeLabel - The label for displaying date and time.
      sunriseLabel - The label for displaying sunrise time.
      sunsetLabel - The label for displaying sunset time.
